content.rendered:
Directed by Martin McDonagh

Written by Martin McDonagh

Star Colin Farrell(Pádraic Súilleabháin). Brendan Gleeson(Colm Doherty). Kerry Condon(Siobhan Súilleabháin). Barry Keoghan(Dominic Kearney). Gary Lydon(Peadar Kearney). Pat Shortt(Jonjo Devine). Sheila Flitton(Mrs. McCormick). Bríd Ní Neachtain(Mrs. O’Riordan). Jon Kenny(Gerry). Aaron Monaghan(Declan). David Pearse(Priest)

Language English

Producers Daniel Battsek. Graham Broadbent. Peter Czernin. James Flynn. Jo Homewood. Ben Knight. Peter Kohn. Ollie Madden. Martin McDonagh. Diarmuid McKeown

Production Blueprint Pictures. Film 4. Metropolitan Films International
